com.facebook.litho.animation

Interface AnimatedProperty


  • public interface AnimatedProperty
    A property on a mount item (View or Drawable), e.g. x, y, scale, text color, etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float get(java.lang.Object mountItem) 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      void set(java.lang.Object mountItem, float value)
      Updates the value of this property on the given mount item to the given value.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of this property. It should be unique across properties that a mount item can have. It's used for identification purposes only. E.g., "x", "y", etc.

      • get

        float get(java.lang.Object mountItem)
        Returns:
        the current value of this property on the given mount item (View or Drawable).

      • set

        void set(java.lang.Object mountItem,
         float value)
        Updates the value of this property on the given mount item to the given value.
